title: The Macular Degeneration Handbook Simple Solutions for Saving Your Sight
description: Those who suffer from Macular Degeneration or other degenerative eye diseases including Cataracts, Lacoma, Retinitis Pigmentosa and eye diseases associated with diabetes can benefit from this book. Readers learn symptoms, causes, treatments and prevention strategies using all-natural and alternative methods. The book shows how nutrition, dietary supplements, exercises and other methods can bring relief.
author: Chet Cunningham
